languages.text: "Давай договоримся. Выпусти меня и можешь просить что угодно — кроме моей смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Давай договоримся. Выпусти меня и можешь просить что угодно — кроме моей смерти".

languages.text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."
languages.original_text: "Давай договоримся. Выпусти меня и можешь просить что угодно — кроме моей смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."
"Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my body."
"Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my body."
"Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."
"Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."
"Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

languages.text: “我们来做笔交易吧。放我出去，除了我的命之外，你想要什么，我都可以给你。”
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

traits.locale_text: “我们来做笔交易吧。放我出去，除了我的命之外，你想要什么，我都可以给你。”

languages.text: «Hagamos un trato. Libéreme y le daré lo que quiera. Menos mi muerte».
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

traits.locale_text: «Hagamos un trato. Libéreme y le daré lo que quiera. Menos mi muerte».

languages.text: "Anlaşalım. Beni çıkarırsan ölümüm dışında her şeyi isteyebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşalım. Beni çıkarırsan ölümüm dışında her şeyi isteyebilirsin."

languages.text: 「取引しよう。{mf|俺|私}を出してくれたら、命以外なら何でも与えよう」
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

traits.locale_text: 「取引しよう。{mf|俺|私}を出してくれたら、体以外なら何でも与えよう」

languages.text: « Je vous propose un marché. Laissez-moi sortir, et je vous accorderai tout ce que vous voudrez, sauf ma mort. »
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous propose un marché. Laissez-moi sortir, et je vous accorderai tout ce que vous voudrez, sauf ma mort. »

languages.text: "Machen wir ein Geschäft. Lasst mich raus, dann könnt Ihr alles von mir verlangen außer meinen Tod."
languages.original_text: "Let's make a deal. Let me out and you can ask for anything except my death."

traits.locale_text: "Machen wir ein Geschäft. Lasst mich raus, dann könnt Ihr alles von mir verlangen außer meinen Tod."
